brand_essence.core_message: You set the goal. We deliver proven support to reach it.
brand_essence.brand_voice: Empowering, direct, action-oriented. Motivational without being intimidating. Speaks to the doer, not the dreamer.

primary_icp.profile: Gym regular (3-5x/week), tracks macros, follows fitness influencers, values results over hype. Budget-conscious but won't compromise on quality. Seeks visible progress and measurable gains.
pain_points: Confusing nutrition advice and overcomplicated products
motivations: Visible muscle gains and strength progress
Getting maximum value without sacrificing quality
primary_icp.language_they_use: Gains, macros, bulk, cut, PR (personal record), shred, lean, recovery, pump

secondary_icp.profile: Active lifestyle (running, yoga, HIIT), health-focused rather than bodybuilding-focused. Wants clean ingredients and transparency. Often vegan/vegetarian or flexitarian.

primary.usage: CTAs, energy, action, primary brand presence

design_principles.composition: Bold diagonal lines creating forward momentum. Asymmetric geometric blocks. Dynamic, not static.
design_principles.energy_level: High-impact but not chaotic. Confident and purposeful.
photography_style: Real people, real results - not overly polished
Warm, natural lighting with golden hour tones
Action shots: mid-workout, post-gym, shake preparation
Diverse body types and fitness levels
Product integration feels natural, not forced
layout_rules: Bold typography dominates - headlines are unmissable
Generous white space around key messages

typography.headlines: Bold, condensed sans-serif. ALL CAPS for impact. Short, punchy statements.
typography.body: Clean, readable sans-serif. Keep it brief.
typography.numbers: Extra bold, oversized for nutritional stats (35G PROTEIN)

headline_formulas: YOUR GOAL. OUR FUEL. REAL RESULTS.
EVERY REP COUNTS. EVERY SCOOP DELIVERS.
FROM [CURRENT STATE] TO [GOAL STATE]. WE'VE GOT YOU.

do: Use active, commanding verbs (Fuel, Build, Power, Achieve)
Lead with benefits and results, not features
Speak directly to the user (You, Your)
Be specific with numbers (35g protein, 387 calories)
Acknowledge the work they're putting in
dont: Use fitness bro clich√©s or toxic gym culture language

message_hierarchy.primary: The tangible benefit (Build muscle, Boost recovery, Hit your macros)
message_hierarchy.secondary: The proof point (35g protein, Award-winning quality, Trusted since 2004)
message_hierarchy.tertiary: The accessibility angle (Affordable, For everyone, All dietary needs)

structure.visual: Product shot with dynamic diagonal background OR action shot with product integration
structure.headline: Bold, 3-7 words max, top third of image
structure.stat_callout: Large nutritional benefit (35G PROTEIN) in contrasting color

example_concepts: Split screen: 'Before gym' vs 'After shake' with energy contrast
Macro shot of powder scoop with bold '35G PROTEIN PER SERVING' overlay
Athlete mid-rep with 'EVERY REP COUNTS. EVERY SCOOP DELIVERS.' headline

structure.right_two_thirds: Diagonal coral block with headline + key stat + CTA
structure.trust_badge: Small award icon or 'Trusted since 2004' in corner

structure.0-3s: Hook - Bold text question or statement ('Struggling to hit your protein goals?')
structure.3-10s: Problem/Solution - Quick cuts of workout + product
structure.10-20s: Proof - Stats overlay, product benefits, real results

video_ads.visual_style: Fast-paced cuts, warm color grade, energetic music, real gym environments

proof_points: Options for every diet (vegan, vegetarian, dairy-free, gluten-free)
competitive_angles: For real people with real goals

seasonal_campaign_angles.new_year: NEW YEAR. NEW GAINS. SAME PROVEN QUALITY.
seasonal_campaign_angles.back_to_gym: BACK TO THE GRIND. BACK TO BASICS.
seasonal_campaign_angles.bulk_season: BULK SEASON IS HERE. ARE YOU READY?
